group_1.textLeft: Phew!
Spendin' time on the beach@is such a luxury!

group_1.textRight: It's a good idea to relax now and then@instead of just playing around.

group_1.textLeft: We're going to make this next sand@castle a magnificent one!

group_1.textCenter: Eh? I want to wrap this up and play@something else...

group_1.textRight: Then let's have this castle be the last,@alright?
I have some seashells I need to gather@for Miss Futaba and her friends.
I never get tired of watching those@three go.
They're always so adorable no matter@what they're up to.

group_1.textLeft: I wanna repay 'em all at some point@as a show of thanks.
They've helped us out a lot.

group_1.textRight: Indeed.
Oh yes, we should get a souvenir for@Mii as well.
She was the one who inspired this trip,@after all.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, let's get her something.
...Say, Coordinator.

group_1.textRight: Hmm?

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.

group_1.textRight: Very good. Now thank me even more!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. Thank you - I can't tell you how@grateful I am.

group_1.textRight: ...You're being even more honest than usual.@Was there something in your food?

group_1.textLeft: No, I'm serious - listen to me.
...Were you actually angry back then?
Don't be ridiculous.
...[wait:0.8][chara:121003:cheek_0][chara:121003:eyeClose_0:motion_200][chara:121003:lipSynch_1]Don't be RIDICULOUS!
I thought you said you didn't want@this tragedy to repeat itself.
I thought you wanted everyone@to be free...and happy!
And yet you're choosing to end it@like this...
Is this REALLY what you wanted?!
Thanks to how upset you were,
I think you helped that Diviner remember@what she really wanted.
I think she's grateful to you.

group_1.textRight: That's...

group_1.textLeft: And so am I.
Cause you saved me from bein'@a colossal moron.

group_1.textRight: That's true.
To think the Coordinator's guardian@ended up being saved by her own charge...
That's not how it's supposed to go!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry 'bout that.
...But I think the reason I sympathized@with that girl so much...
...is 'cause her wish was so much like mine.

group_1.textRight: Momoko...

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm sure you must've seen it before@while adjustin' me.
But it's the first time we've ever@talked about it in person.
I wanted to have the courage to confess@my feelings to the guy I liked.
So much so, I became a Magical Girl for it.

group_1.textRight: ...Yes.

group_1.textLeft: So I've been struggling with love, y'know?
I completely get why she didn't have@the courage to confess...
I wanted it to work out for someone,@at least.

group_1.textRight: But you do realize that doesn't give you a@license to cause so much mayhem to get there?

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh* ...Yeah, I know.
I'll do whatever you say from now on.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*
Then if there's anything I end up leaving@undone when I die...
I want you to finish it for me.

group_1.textLeft: Hey...talkin' like that'll bring you bad luck!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* I'm only teasing, of course.
You've made it very clear that you'll@meddle in the affairs of the deceased.
I just had to take a dig at that.

group_1.textLeft: Ha, sure, tease me all ya like...
...But it's fine.
If there's something you can't accomplish,@I'll make it happen.
If we don't get a happy ending,@I'll make it amount to something.

group_1.textRight: What shall I ask you to do next, then~?

group_1.textLeft: Wait, there's more?!

group_1.textRight: Just as you wished, Momoko,@I WILL ask you for everything...
...now and forever. Okay?
